Package DataAccess

Class UserDao

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.UserDao
public class UserDao extends Object
Inserts, queries, updates, and deletes Users

    • create

      public void create(User user) throws DataAccessException
      Creates a new User and inserts it into the Database
      Parameters:
      user - The user to insert into the Database
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • findUserByPersonID

      public User findUserByPersonID(String personID) throws DataAccessException
      Gets a User from the Database by personID
      Parameters:
      personID - The personID associated with the User to get
      Returns:
      The User associated with the personID if one exists, else null
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • findUserByUsername

      public User findUserByUsername(String username) throws DataAccessException
      Gets a User from the Database by username
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the User to get
      Returns:
      The User associated with the userID if one exists, else null
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • update

      public void update(User oldUser, User newUser) throws DataAccessException
      Replaces a User in the Database with another
      Parameters:
      oldUser - The User to be replaced
      newUser - The User to replace the old User
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • delete

      public void delete(User user) throws DataAccessException
      Removes a User from the Database
      Parameters:
      user - The User to remove from the Database
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll() throws DataAccessException
      Removes all Users from the Database
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • validateUser

      public boolean validateUser(String username, String password) throws DataAccessException
      Checks whether a username matches its corresponding password
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to validate
      password - The password to check against the actual password
      Returns:
      True if password matches the password in the Database, else false
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database
